results.title: My brother's birthday
results.creator_credit: Max Hammond, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In Syria, on the way to Beirut, Max Hammond’s thoughts turned to his family. One of seven children, Hammond and his three brothers served together in World War II. He recounts a close call that occurred on his brother’s birthday and reflects on how lucky he and his brothers are.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Max Hammond, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My Brother's Bedroom
results.brief_description: A winner in the Junior Animation category for Screen It 2016. My brother’s bedroom door was always closed. I was never allowed into his bedroom. What was the mystery? I couldn’t stand it any longer and had to risk everything to have a look at what was behind his bedroom door.

results.title: My brother
results.creator_credit: Multimedia Design, Faculty of Design, Swinburne University of Technology
results.brief_description:
A cautionary tale about sibling love, rivalry and loyalty and a dare that turned 7 year old Tessa’s life upside down.
No credits available.
